title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. I, ch. V, subch. B, pt. 460 - Requirement For Liability Insurance And Certificate Of Self-insurance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. I, ch. V, subch. B, pt. 460 - Requirement For Liability Insurance And Certificate Of Self-insurance

State Regulations
§ 460.0 - Repealed
§ 460.1 - Applicability of law
§ 460.2 - Amount of insurance
§ 460.3 - Proof of insurance
§ 460.4 - Certificate of self-insurance
§ 460.5 - Application for certificate of self-insurance
§ 460.6 - Notification of approval or disapproval of application for self-insurance
§ 460.7 to 460.16 - Renumbered

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. I, ch. V, subch. B, pt. 460

Statutory authority: PRHPL, §25.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
